hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Java_Backend
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the name of the Java Backend branch

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Flask_Backend_branch
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the name of the Backend branch

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Container_Name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the name of the container in lower case, backup: you can put your name

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Build_Image
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the name of the docker build image which will be used to build binaries

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Service_pack_version
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the version of Service pack. Sample values will be like: 6.3.2.0

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Latest_dmap_image_version
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the latest version of DMAP image. Sample values be like:7.4.2.1

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Minimum_dmap_image_version
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the Minimum version of DMAP DB image to run current binaries. Sample values be like:7.4.2.1

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: Storage_Location
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Enter the storage location to store Service pack which is either in S3 or BLOB

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: S3_Bucket
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the S3 Bucket path for uploading the binaries. Sample values will be like dev: dmap-deployment/dev, qa: dmap-deployment/qa, prod: dmap-deployment/prod

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Blob_Storage
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the Blob storage path for uploading the binaries. Sample values will be like dev: dmapextndevreleases, qa: dmapextnqareleases, prod: dmapextnreleases

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: sonarTypes
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the sonarQube issue types to certify the build

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: sonarSeverities
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the sonarQube issue severities to certify the build

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: docker_branch
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter git branch to pull docker files

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: service_pack_location
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter service pack location (S3/BLOB). It should be full path
